cards.title: The Hatter
setup: At the start of the game, {TheHatter} enters play “Malicious Milliner“ side up.
Cards are revealed from the top of the villain deck until {H - 1} Thralls are revealed and put into play. Other revealed cards are shuffled back into the villain deck.
gameplay: Whenever a Thrall is destroyed, each hero discards a card.
At the start of the villain turn, if there are 1 or fewer Thralls in play, {TheHatter} flips.
cards.advanced: Increase damage dealt to hero targets by 1.
flippedGameplay: Whenever a Thrall is destroyed, each hero discards a card.
At the end of the villain turn, {TheHatter} deals the 2 heroes with the lowest HP {H - 2} psychic damage each. Each hero dealt damage this way must destroy one of their ongoing or equipment cards
At the start of the villain turn, if there are 2 or more Thralls in play, {TheHatter} flips.
cards.flippedAdvanced: At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck.
cards.challengeText: The first time each turn {TheHatter} would be dealt damage, redirect that damage to a Thrall.

openingLines.default: Want a hat? They're half price, today only!
openingLines.GuardiansOfTomorrow.ArgusCharacter: I'm just an ordinary hatmaker. Don't mind me.
openingLines.GuardiansOfTomorrow.GuardiansOfTomorrowA: You're acting irrational! A nice hat would help.

cards.title: The Queen of Hearts
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, destroy {H - 2} hero ongoing cards and this card deals the hero with the most cards in play 2 sonic damage.
cards.flavorText: This just in, the Guardians have been seen{br}aiding and abetting the known criminal Lauren Kirk.
cards.flavorReference: The Queen of Hearts, Guardians of Tomorrow #23

cards.title: The March Hare
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the 2 hero targets with the highest HP {H} melee damage each
cards.flavorText: Excuse me, but did you say a big guy in a{br}bunny suit was robbing the bank?

cards.title: The Cheshire Cat
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, destroy {H - 2} equipment cards and this card deals the hero target with the lowest HP 2 melee damage.
cards.flavorText: The hat makes her invisible? That's not fair!

cards.title: The Caterpillar
cards.body: Reduce damage dealt to this card by 1. At the end of the villain turn, destroy an environment card. If a non-target card was destroyed this way, this card deals each hero target 2 projectile damage.

cards.title: The Dodo
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, each Thrall regains 1 HP and this card deals the hero target with the second lowest HP 2 sonic damage.
cards.flavorText: I do-do-don't suppose we could talk{br}about this?

cards.title: The Card Soldiers
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the 3 hero targets with the highest HP 1 irreducible melee damage each.
cards.flavorText: They're just civilians! We can't hurt them!

cards.title: Watch Your Heads!
cards.body: {TheHatter} deals each hero target 1 projectile damage. He deals each target dealt damage this way {H} psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: Look out for those hats! Don't let them get on your heads!

cards.title: Booming Sales
cards.body: At the start of the villain turn, reveal cards from the villain deck until a Thrall is revealed. Put the revealed card into play and discard the remaining cards.
cards.flavorText: ALL HATS HALF OFF, TODAY ONLY!

cards.title: Deadly Tie
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, {TheHatter} deals the hero target with the second highest HP {H} lightning damage.
cards.flavorText: Actually, haberdashery refers to all{br}menswear, not just hats.

cards.title: Inspiring Hat
cards.body: Increase damage dealt by Thralls by 1
cards.flavorText: Two hats? Why does he need two hats?

cards.title: The White Rabbit
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, the hero with the most cards in hand must discard 2 cards. Then this card deals each other Thrall 1 sonic damage.
cards.flavorReference: The White Rabbit, Guardians of Tomorrow Annual #1

cards.title: The Duck
cards.body: Whenever this card is damaged by a hero target, it deals the source of the damage 2 psychic damage.

cards.title: The Executioner
cards.body: At the start of the villain turn, this card deals the thrall or non-villain target other than itself with the lowest HP {H} melee damage.
cards.flavorReference: The Queen of Hearts, Guardians of Tomorrow #12

cards.title: Playing with Lives
cards.body: {TheHatter} deals each Thrall 5 sonic damage. If any thralls are destroyed this way, he then deals each hero target {H} psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: You monster! Those are people, not{br}playthings!

cards.title: Get Them! Get Them All!
cards.body: Each Thrall deals each hero target 1 melee damage. If there are no thralls in play, play the top card of the villain deck.
cards.flavorText: Fall back! There's too many of them!
